info.author: Hammerfall Studios/aerikmon
info.description: Top down helicopter combat game with roguelike elements, procedurally generated content and a focus on strategy and resource management.
info.name: Helicopter Helicopter Heli...

intel.description: Rare data required for advanced prototype unlocks.

success.description: All biomes cleared. Returning to base with full cargo.

poi_rescue.name: Civilian Rescue
poi_rescue.description: Extract civilians trapped in hostile structures before they are overwhelmed.

poi_destroy.name: Radar Sabotage
poi_destroy.description: Locate and demolish enemy radar arrays to blind local defenses.

poi_convoy_defend.name: Convoy Defend
poi_convoy_defend.description: Protect a 4-vehicle civilian convoy as it travels from its starting point to a safe zone. Rewards scale with survivor count.

description: A sprawling, soot-stained industrial complex where molten metal flows like water.
The air vibrates with the ceaseless grinding of The Constructor's machinery.
Becomes accessible once the city's automated defenses are dismantled.
arena_city_boss.name: The Iron Foundry

description: The jagged peak of the highest mountain, perpetually shrouded in unnatural lightning storms.
Visibility is near zero, illuminated only by the Storm Bird's engines.
Unlocked by clearing the alpine sector of AA batteries.
arena_mountain_boss.name: Thunderhead Summit

description: A vast, crystalline crater formed by intense heat.
Shifting sands and blinding reflections conceal the Mirage Core's true location.
Accessible only after securing the desert supply lines.
arena_desert_boss.name: The Glass Cradle

base_oil_rig.description: A weather-beaten extraction platform in the middle of a stormy ocean. The operations command center.
base_oil_rig.name: Oil Rig

base_safe_zone_1.description: A hastily established Forward Operating Base in the ruins of the city, fortified against the drone swarms.
base_safe_zone_1.name: FOB: Echo

base_safe_zone_2.description: A hidden supply cache and research station dug into the mountain rock, offering respite from the cold.
base_safe_zone_2.name: Outpost: Mirage

description: A decaying metropolis of concrete canyons and rusted skyscrapers.
Streets are choked with debris, and the skyline is dominated by surveillance towers.
Patrolled by hunter-killer drones and automated turrets.
biome_city.name: City

description: Treacherous alpine terrain where dense pine forests and icy ravines hide lethal ambushes.
The cold air freezes weaker components, and the wind masks the sound of approaching hostiles.
biome_mountains.name: Mountains

description: An endless expanse of scorching dunes and ancient ruins.
Heat distortion makes enemies hard to spot, and sudden sandstorms can cut sensors.
Home to stealth units and long-range railgun emplacements.
biome_desert.name: Desert

ult_orbital.name: Orbital Strike
ult_orbital.description: Calls down a high-intensity laser beam from orbit, dealing massive damage in a large area.

ult_support.name: Squadron Call-In
ult_support.description: Summons 2 allied Gunner Drones that follow the player and attack nearby enemies for a duration.

ult_repair.name: Nanite Cloud
ult_repair.description: Releases a repair cloud that rapidly regenerates 50% of the helicopter's health over time.

ult_emp.name: Thunderclap EMP
ult_emp.description: Detonates a powerful electromagnetic pulse that stuns all enemies on screen.

ult_shield.name: Aegis Field
ult_shield.description: Projects an impenetrable energy shield that blocks all incoming damage.

ult_overdrive.name: System Overdrive
ult_overdrive.description: Overclocks all systems, doubling movement speed and fire rate for a short time.

skill_repair.name: System Repair
skill_repair.description: Emergency repair protocol. Restores 30% HP over 5s.

skill_static.name: Static Discharge
skill_static.description: Releases an expanding electric ring that stuns enemies for 2s.

weapon_machine_gun.description: Standard issue rotary cannon. Reliable and versatile.
weapon_machine_gun.name: Machine Gun

secondary_attack.name: Heavy Slug
secondary_attack.description: High velocity heavy round that pierces enemies.

secondary_attack.name: Concussive Blast
secondary_attack.description: Short range blast that pushes enemies back.

weapon_rocket.description: Heavy ordnance launcher for armored targets.
weapon_rocket.name: Rocket Launcher

primary_attack.name: High-Ex Missile
primary_attack.description: Slow moving, high damage explosive missile.

secondary_attack.name: Prismatic Lance
secondary_attack.description: High intensity discharge that pierces enemies.

boss_city.name: The Constructor
boss_city.description: A massive, quadrupedal construction mech that builds its own cover and turrets.

mechanics.phase_1: Builder: Moves slowly, constructs 'Rock Blocks' (Basalt Columns) to create environmental hazards, summons Scout Drones.
mechanics.phase_2: Transition: Becomes stationary, raises a 'Rock Cluster' (10 blocks) and prepares a lethal detonation.
mechanics.phase_3: Fortress: Remains stationary, deploys dual Auto-Turrets with high fire rate, periodically raises flanking Rock Blocks to restrict movement.
mechanics.ultimate: Shattering Pulse: Detonates all active Rock Blocks, sending high-speed shrapnel in a cross-pattern from each block's location.

boss_mountain.name: Storm Bird
boss_mountain.description: A sleek, high-altitude stealth bomber drone controlling the weather.

mechanics.phase_1: Dogfight: High speed strafing runs with machine guns. Immune to slow projectiles.
mechanics.phase_2: Thunderhead: Ascends to high altitude (invulnerable), calling down targeted lightning strikes.
mechanics.ultimate: Downdraft: Creates massive wind pressure pushing player into hazard zones.

boss_desert.name: Mirage Core
boss_desert.description: A hovering crystalline core protected by shifting sand shields and holograms.

mechanics.phase_1: Refraction: Creates 2 explosive holographic copies. Real core shimmers slightly.
mechanics.phase_2: Sandstorm: Reduces vision radius, spawns Elite Mirage Drones to ambush.
mechanics.ultimate: Solar Lens: Focuses a giant tracking laser that turns sand into glass (permanent slow zone).

attacks.main: Light Autocannon: Low caliber rounds with slow fire rate

behavior: Patrols designated sector in erratic pattern
Pursues player aggressively upon detection
Maintains short-range firing distance
Seeks cover behind Tank Drones if available
mob_drone_scout.description: Lightweight reconnaissance unit. Weak but annoying in groups.
mob_drone_scout.name: Scout Drone

attacks.main: Heavy Repeater: High rate of fire, medium damage suppression

behavior: Patrols slowly, acting as a mobile anchor
Engages immediately upon detecting threat
Interposes itself between player and allied drones to soak damage
mob_drone_tank.description: Heavily armored hex-copter designed for frontline durability.
mob_drone_tank.name: Tank Drone

attacks.main: Rail Rifle: Charged shot with extreme range and high piercing damage

behavior: Holds position at maximum range
Charges shot while stationary; interrupts charge if damaged
Flees to maintain distance if player closes in
mob_drone_sniper.description: Precision combat unit optimized for long-range engagement.
mob_drone_sniper.name: Sniper Drone

attacks.main: EMP Blaster: Low damage shot that briefly disables player controls

behavior: Flanks player to attack from blind spots
Retreats immediately after firing to recharge
Coordinates with damage dealers to lock down targets
mob_drone_stun.description: Disruptor unit equipped with electromagnetic weaponry.
mob_drone_stun.name: Stun Drone

attacks.main: Repair Field: Projects a healing aura (green circle) restoring ally HP
attacks.secondary: Shield Generator: Projects a temporary shield on damaged allies

behavior: Avoids player, prioritizes taking cover behind Tank Drones (displacing Scouts)
Follows elite mobs or bosses if present
Flees actively if it is the last unit remaining
mob_drone_support.description: Utility drone that keeps other enemies alive
mob_drone_support.name: Support Drone

attacks.main: Homing missiles with high tracking but slow speed
attacks.secondary: Charge attack that deals massive contact damage

behavior: Uses cover in mountains to break line of sight
Aggressively closes distance to use charge attack
Retreats briefly when taking heavy damage
mob_elite_hunter.description: Elite heavy drone with reinforced plating
mob_elite_hunter.name: Hunter Drone (Elite)

attacks.main: High-intensity railgun beam that requires charging
attacks.secondary: Deploy jamming field that disables player radar

behavior: Uses active camouflage to appear semi-transparent
Relocates constantly after firing to prevent locking on
Only decloaks fully when charging main attack
mob_elite_mirage.description: Elite stealth drone specialized in ambushes
mob_elite_mirage.name: Mirage Drone (Elite)

attacks.secondary: Cluster missile barrage covering a wide area

behavior: Hunts the player across the map regardless of distance
Adapts resistance to the weapon type hurting it most
Enters a 'Berserk Mode' (Ultimate) at 30% HP, doubling speed and fire rate
mob_elite_nemesis.name: Nemesis Prototype
